Bots:
<Bot type="{bottype}"> <DataItems> <DataItem> <RequestType>{Notification|Request}</RequestType> <Id>{MTConnect DataItem Id}</id> <Path>{JSON Path for the JObject value in JsonRPC response}</Path> <Type>{Condition|Event|Sample}</Type> </DataItem> </DataItems> </Bot>
Request serial $.result.iserial EVENT handshake
Request xAccImp $.result.acceleration.impulse_speed_limit_mm_per_s.x SAMPLE get_config
Request xFeed $.result.acceleration.rate_mm_per_s_sq.x SAMPLE get_config
Request yAccImp $.result.acceleration.impulse_speed_limit_mm_per_s.y SAMPLE get_config
Request yFeed $.result.acceleration.rate_mm_per_s_sq.y SAMPLE get_config
Request zAccImp $.result.acceleration.impulse_speed_limit_mm_per_s.z SAMPLE get_config
Request zFeed $.result.acceleration.rate_mm_per_s_sq.z SAMPLE get_config
Notification tnum $.params.info.toolheads.extruder[0].tool_id EVENT
Notification thTemp $.params.info.toolheads.extruder[0].current_temperature SAMPLE
Notification thTargetTemp $.params.info.toolheads.extruder[0].target_temperature SAMPLE
Request aAccImp $.result.acceleration.impulse_speed_limit_mm_per_s.a SAMPLE get_config
Request aFeed $.result.acceleration.rate_mm_per_s_sq.a SAMPLE get_config
Request thSerial $.result.serial EVENT get_tool_usage_stats
Request thTotExtM $.result.extrusion_mass_g SAMPLE get_tool_usage_stats
Request thTotExtL $.result.extrusion_distance_mm SAMPLE get_tool_usage_stats
Request thExtTime $.result.extrusion_time_s SAMPLE get_tool_usage_stats
Request thRetrCnt $.result.retract_count EVENT get_tool_usage_stats
Request thRefCnt $.result.refurb_count EVENT get_tool_usage_stats
Notification oper $.params.info.current_process.username EVENT
Notification thing $.params.info.current_process.thing_id EVENT
Notification prog $.params.info.current_process.filename EVENT
Notification spExtruded $.params.info.current_process.filament_extruded EVENT
